intro: We've called out the letter in the title to this quiz. That lets you know the first letter of each answer

questions.ask: In what kind of room did Jesus celebrate His last Passover with His disciples?
What, along with wisdom, does Solomon urge readers of the Proverbs to get?
What land did the patriarch Abraham hail from?
What kind of god had the people of Athens built an altar to - prompting the apostle Paul to share the true God with them?
What man, attempting to steady the ark of the covenant on its cart, was struck dead for touching it?

section: Unto us a child is born
intro: The birth of Christ - a remarkable fulfillment of prophecy and a key event in all human history. What do you remember of the Bible's Christmas story?

questions.ask: What town in Judea was the birthplace of Jesus?
What animal feeding trough served as a temporary bed for the newborn Jesus
What name, meaning "God with us," did Isaiah prophesy for Jesus?
What relative did Jesus' mother, Mary, stay with while she was expecting?
What, according to the prophet Isaiah, would Jesus carry on His shoulders?

intro: Call 'em riots, hubbubs, or donnybrooks, you'll find a number of uproars in the pages of Scripture! What can you tell us about these?

questions.ask: What idol were the Israelites worshiping with shouting and singing when Moses arrived with God's Ten Commandments?
What disciple was martyred by an angry, screaming crowd, after a critical speech to the Sanhedrin?
What did Moses fear the thirsty Israelites would do to him at a dry place called Rephidim?
In what city did silversmiths - fearing the effect of Paul's preaching on their idol-making business - stir up a riot?
What two groups of people, according to the crowd at Jesus' crucifixion, should bear responsibility for Jesus' death?

intro: He had a beautiful wife - and that got him killed. What else do you recall of the story of Uriah the Hittite?

questions.ask: What beautiful wife of Uriah was improperly taken - and made pregnant - by a lustful King David?
What was Uriah's occupation?
How many nights did David try to make Uriah go home to sleep with his wife?
Where did King David later order Uriah?
questions.ans: the fiercest part of the battle, to his death

questions.ask: What prophet confronted David about his sins toward Uriah?
